title: Language Competency Strengthening Project Through Culture-Based Educational Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education experience and general understanding of multicultural environments
context.additional_context: A course for current practitioners to design and evaluate language education materials reflecting diverse cultural backgrounds. Utilizing collaboration tools in BYOD environments with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can design language education projects by applying the four stages (Management-Design-Development-Evaluation) of the Culture-Based Model (CBM)
Learners can analyze linguistic and cultural characteristics of target cultural groups and incorporate them into instructional design elements
Through PBL team activities, learners can develop language education prototypes considering multicultural learners and conduct peer evaluations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
